features: STRONG & SOFT WIPE: This flushable toddler wipe is made from 100% plant-based material and doesn’t contain any plastic like some baby wipes do. This wet wipe is strong, thick, extremely durable yet is super soft for tantrum-free clean.

GENTLE FORMULA FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Enriched with naturally derived skin cleansers, this fragrance-free, hypoallergenic formula has been dermatologist-tested and developed without any nasty ingredients - phenoxyethanol, alcohol, fragrances, parabens, phthalates, harsh irritants, dyes and chemical binders.

PERFECT FOR POTTY TRAINING: Make potty training easier with a reliable flushable wipe that comes in a convenient 42-count pack that fits easily in any diaper bag or backpack for travel. This unscented wipe is ideal for babies, children and kids of all ages, including adults.

FRESH WIPES EVERY TIME: The packaging is designed with an easy open-and-close, flip-top Moisture Lock lid to prevent wipes from drying out before use. In this offer, there are 6 bulk packs. Each pack includes 42 wipes for a total of 252 kids wipes.
CLEAN BETTER THAN TOILET PAPER ALONE: Your little one deserves to feel nice and clean. These butt wipes clean better than toilet paper alone and offer a refreshing cleansing experience.
body.description: Nice N' CLEAN Flushable Toddler Wipes are made from 100% plant-based material and doesn’t contain any plastic like some baby wipes do. This flushable wet wipe is strong, thick, extremely durable yet is super soft and unscented for tantrum-free clean. Make potty training easier with a reliable kids wipe that comes in a convenient 42-count bulk pack that fits easily in any diaper bag or backpack for travel. Your little one deserves to feel nice and clean. These fragrance-free butt wipes clean better than toilet paper alone and offer a refreshing cleansing experience while sensitive to skin. Like all of our wipes, they are made in the USA, and the first ingredient is water. This unscented toilet wipe is designed for children, but people of all ages are able to use and benefit, including adults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old loves his wipes! Great price & soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: I had previously tried a different brand of flushable wipes for my potty training toddler, but it didn’t wipe good at all. I knew I wasn’t going to buy those again. Tried these next and am very pleased. These wipes really get the job done. They are wet enough to clean and do not easily tear. Haven’t had any problems with flushing either. Already re-ordered once and will again when we’re close to running out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad but could be better
reviews.reviewText: Wipes for kids not bad but could be better, they dry out way too fast and they are not closed properly which kids don’t always do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So gentle on the skin and does the job!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We have been purchasing these wipes since June and they have become our to go thing here at home! It keeps my 6 year old clean without the big toilet paper mess we used to have before (he would use waaay more than needed and still not stay 100% clean), it’s also great for my toddler and even for me! I always carry one un my bag in case I ever run into a public restroom that is out of paper. I absolutely LOVE that they are flushable and don’t leave anything smelling bad in the bathroom and it has a great size.The first wipes might be a little tricky to pull since they may get ripped if you are not careful but that is all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They were ok
reviews.reviewText: They were kind of to small and they tore when I wiped my toddler. They were ok but not for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work great
reviews.reviewText: These are great. There is no rash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subscribe and save.
reviews.reviewText: This comes every other month. It says for baby use, but we use it as adults and it is big enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They nailed it 💰👌🏼🧻
reviews.reviewText: My household has gotten a lot of use out of flushable wipes the past couple years after first trying them out when you literally couldn’t get toilet paper right after Covid. 😅Come to find out, moist wipes that flush fine are actually better than toilet paper in basically every way. We’ve been buying the adult version of these Nice n Clean wipes for a while and really like them.This Kids Version is the best one yet in our opinion. The wipes are a little thinner, but are still remarkably strong and don’t rip in your hand at all. They seem more flushable. But they are still very soft, and have some magical ingredients that my 9 year old described as “I dunno dad, these feel nice.” My kids don’t want to go back to TP. 😬
